column4: hi - just to be clear, guided - Resize SCIS1 paritiion#1 and used free space WON'T delete anything, right?
hi - just to be clear, guided - Resize SCIS1 paritiion#1 and used free space WON'T delete anything, right?
there are always risks resizing partitions, backup anything you cant afford to lose and if a windows drive is resized, defrag it.. twice
